speaker: agent
text: You remember we had a word regarding your Medicare.

speaker: agent
text: Miss, do you remember we had a word regarding your Medicare insurance?

speaker: agent
text: I talked to a lot of people about Medicare insurance.

speaker: customer
text: Okay, let me just explain you.

speaker: agent
text: Miss, Miss, the reason for my call is to let you know your Medicare insurance has been upgraded and you will be receiving more benefit from your Medicare plan at no additional cost.

speaker: customer
text: So I hope that sounds good.

speaker: agent
text: So the benefit which you are entitled to receive today, include your [OCCUPATION] co payment.

speaker: agent
text: Once we provide you the benefit, you no longer have to pay any co payments to your [OCCUPATION], to your [OCCUPATION], neither to your hospital.

speaker: agent
text: And you will be also getting dental, vision, hearing glasses, transportation benefit which will help you in getting pickup and drop services from the ambulance in emergency.

speaker: agent
text: All this will be added to your Medicare plan at no additional cost.

speaker: agent
text: So your full name is [PERSON_NAME] [PERSON_NAME], right?

speaker: agent
text: And the zip code will be [LOCATION].

speaker: agent
text: And your date of birth is [DATE_OF_BIRTH] [DATE_OF_BIRTH].

speaker: agent
text: Okay, so miss, here I can see you are totally qualified to get this benefit.

speaker: agent
text: Now, what I will do, I will just quickly connect your call to my licensed [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] and my [OCCUPATION] will explain you in detail, like what all benefits you will be getting this year from your Medicare plan and regarding your paperwork.

speaker: agent
text: And miss, they will be just taking your [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION], not more than that.

speaker: customer
text: Okay, well, I am expecting an appointment person coming to my house in [DURATION] [DURATION].

speaker: customer
text: Yeah, can you call me back a little later this afternoon?

speaker: customer
text: Miss, I will be calling you back later.
